description: Template for generating comprehensive release prompts from N8N output

textPrompts.title: LinkedIn Carousel Post
textPrompts.template:
Create a 10-slide LinkedIn carousel about "{topic}". Each slide should have:
- Slide 1: Hook/Title
- Slides 2-8: Key points with actionable insights
- Slide 9: Call-to-action
- Slide 10: About me/contact

Use this content as reference: {baseContent}

textPrompts.title: Twitter Thread
textPrompts.template:
Transform this LinkedIn post about "{topic}" into a compelling Twitter thread (8-12 tweets):
- Start with a hook tweet
- Break down key insights into digestible tweets
- Include relevant hashtags
- End with engagement question

Base content: {baseContent}

textPrompts.title: Blog Article Outline
textPrompts.template:
Create a comprehensive blog article outline for "{topic}" based on this content:
- SEO-optimized title
- Introduction hook
- 5-7 main sections with subpoints
- Conclusion with actionable steps
- Meta description

Source: {baseContent}

textPrompts.title: Video Script
textPrompts.template:
Write a 3-5 minute video script about "{topic}":
- Engaging opening (15 seconds)
- Problem statement (30 seconds)
- Solution breakdown (2-3 minutes)
- Call-to-action (30 seconds)
- Visual cues and transitions

Based on: {baseContent}

textPrompts.title: Email Newsletter
textPrompts.description: Complete email newsletter with subject lines
textPrompts.template:
Create an email newsletter about "{topic}":
- Subject line variations (5 options)
- Engaging preview text
- Newsletter body with personal story
- Resources/links section
- P.S. with engagement hook

Content source: {baseContent}

imagePrompts.title: Hero Image
imagePrompts.description: Professional hero image for social media
imagePrompts.template:
Create a professional hero image for "{topic}":
- Modern, clean design
- Relevant icons or illustrations
- Brand colors: #58A6FF (blue), #A371F7 (purple)
- Readable typography
- LinkedIn post dimensions (1200x627px)

imagePrompts.title: Infographic
imagePrompts.template:
Design an infographic about "{topic}":
- Visual hierarchy with key statistics
- Icons and illustrations
- Step-by-step process or framework
- Professional color scheme
- Mobile-friendly layout

imagePrompts.title: Carousel Slides
imagePrompts.template:
Create 10 carousel slides for "{topic}":
- Consistent design template
- Readable fonts (minimum 24px)
- High contrast colors
- Each slide focuses on one key point
- Instagram/LinkedIn carousel format (1080x1080px)

imagePrompts.title: Quote Graphics
imagePrompts.template:
Design quote graphics from this content about "{topic}":
- Extract 3-5 powerful quotes
- Minimalist design with brand colors
- Attribution to your name
- Various social media sizes
- Shareable format

imagePrompts.title: Video Thumbnail
imagePrompts.template:
Create an eye-catching video thumbnail for "{topic}":
- Bright, contrasting colors
- Large, readable text overlay
- Your photo or relevant imagery
- YouTube/social media friendly
- Clickable and curiosity-driven design

videoPrompts.title: Short-form Video (TikTok/Reels)
videoPrompts.template:
Create a 30-60 second vertical video about "{topic}":
- Hook in first 3 seconds
- Quick tips or insights
- Text overlays for key points
- Trending audio if applicable
- Strong call-to-action at the end

videoPrompts.title: YouTube Video
videoPrompts.template:
Plan a 10-15 minute YouTube video on "{topic}":
- Compelling title and thumbnail concept
- Structured outline with timestamps
- B-roll suggestions
- Screen recording segments
- Engagement hooks throughout

videoPrompts.title: Tutorial Video
videoPrompts.template:
Create a step-by-step tutorial about "{topic}":
- Clear learning objectives
- Screen recording setup
- Voice-over script
- Resource links and materials
- Follow-up content suggestions

marketingPrompts.title: Social Media Campaign
marketingPrompts.template:
Design a 7-day social media campaign for "{topic}":
- Platform-specific content calendar
- Hashtag strategy
- Engagement tactics
- Cross-promotion ideas
- Success metrics to track

marketingPrompts.title: Landing Page Copy
marketingPrompts.template:
Write landing page copy for a resource about "{topic}":
- Compelling headline
- Problem/solution sections
- Social proof elements
- Clear value proposition
- Multiple CTA variations

usageTips: Copy these prompts to your AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, etc.)
Customize the prompts with your specific brand voice and requirements
Use the generated content across multiple platforms for maximum reach
Track performance and iterate based on engagement metrics

variables.topic: The main topic/subject from the original prompt
variables.baseContent: The generated LinkedIn content that serves as source material
